name: Pocoyo Arcade Games
description:
Pocoyo embarks on a journey of nostalgia, with a selection of mini-games based on the classic arcade adventures. Spend hours of family fun!

With Pocoyo Arcade Games you can enjoy the following adventures:

•Virus Kong: Enjoy the best of platform games! Run and overcome obstacles to free the doll from the evil virus!

•Pocojump: Climb as high as you can with Pocoyo! Test your reflexes and your abilities to avoid falling into the void!

•Robertoid: Destroy blocks of colors with Roberto and do not let the ball fall! Only the most skillful will get the best score!

The application is suitable for children and adults and has parental controls to provide a safe environment.

Pocoyo Arcade Games is totally free, but it has advertising that can be eliminated through a single payment.
